content.rendered:
Directed by Ezhil

Written by Ezhil

Star Kumki Ashwin. Chaams. Govindamoorthy. Kamaraj. Muthaiah Kannadasan. Gautham Karthik (Nagulan). Madhushree. Mithun Maheshwaran. Manobala. Parthiban Radhakrishnan (Kathirvelan (as Parthiban)). Saipriya (Raghavi). Robo Shankar (Police Constable Selvam). Vaiyapuri

Language Tamil

Producer D. Vijaykumaran. M. K. Ramprasad

Production Kallal Global Entertainment. M.K.R.P. Productions
